title: Funerary epitaph of Lucius Iulius Attilianus
support: Described by Gualtherus simply as 'in porphyrite'; Bivona infers reasonably that it was a funerary plaque. No further information preserved.

provenanceFound._: Recorded by Gualtherus 1624 as "apud Petrum Rubeum proconservatorem", but also 'non vidi', and no direct autopsy is otherwise recorded.
